cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 241, Tropical Forest and Coral Reef Conservation Reauthorization Act of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 6 (Monday, January 11, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CHABOT:
H.R. 241.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8
[Page H123]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate. Read twice. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 47.

title: Tropical Forest and Coral Reef Conservation Reauthorization Act of 2021
